humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there is 1 lymph node positive for metastatic tumor out of 3 lymph nodes examined. This corresponds to the N1 stage according to the AJCC staging system (New Rule 12). The report also mentions that the final N stage will be assigned after complete lymph node dissection, but based on the information provided, the N stage is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic tumor present in 1 out of 3 examined sentinel lymph nodes (part 3A: 1/1 and part 4: 0/2). The maximum size of the nodal metastasis is 0.6 cm (part 3B). There is focal extracapsular extension identified (part 3C: <0.1 cm). Based on this information, the N stage is N1.
